TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InheritanceMappingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InheritanceMappingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InheritanceMappingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 映射 LINQ to SQL 应用程序中的继承层次结构。

span.span: Maps an inheritance hierarchy in a LINQ to SQL application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个指定每个映射的类。One is specified per mapped class. 映射继承层次结构时，请注意以下事项：Note the following when you map inheritance hierarchies: - 层次结构中的所有类必须都映射到单个表。All classes in a hierarchy must be mapped to a single table. - 继承层次结构的表必须位于层次结构顶部的映射类型上声明。The table for an inheritance hierarchy must be declared on the mapped type that is at the top of the hierarchy. 不能从顶部类派生的类中指定的表或映射的属性。You cannot specify the table or mapping attributes in a class that is derived from the top class. - 你可以使用层次结构中的接口，但[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]未映射。You can use an interface in a hierarchy, but [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] does not map it. - 当映射类，但你可以对映射的类进行查询时，可以跳过层次结构中的类。You can skip a class in the hierarchy when you map classes, but you can query against mapped classes only. 对于正确具体化鉴别器代码值必须是唯一的然后与数据库中的值匹配。For correct materialization, discriminator code values must be unique and match the values in the database. 通过使用具有不完全匹配 （甚至通过大小写） 的鉴别器代码值的行实例化的类设置为`true`。A row with a discriminator code value that does not exactly match (even by casing) instantiates the class by using set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示为层次结构的继承映射顶部，在其中映射类 (`Shape`) 是抽象类。This example shows inheritance mapping for a hierarchy where the top, mapped class (`Shape`) is abstract. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示包含未映射的类。The following example shows the inclusion of unmapped classes. 可以将未映射的类放置层次结构中的任意位置。You can put unmapped classes anywhere in the hierarchy. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Code { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置映射的继承层次结构中的鉴别器代码值。

span.span: Gets or sets the discriminator code value in a mapped inheritance hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDefault { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鉴别器值与指定值不匹配时是否实例化此类型的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an object of this type in instantiated when the discriminator value does not match a specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 恰好有一个特性必须使用声明作为`true`。Exactly one of the attributes must be declared with as `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置层次结构中类的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the class in the hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承层次结构，包括根类型中使用任何非抽象类型。Use any non-abstract type in the inheritance hierarchy, including the root type.
